content:
208 
 
COURSE/DEGREE AWARDING 
INSTITUTIONS  
REQUIREMENTS    
UTME SUBJECTS  
  
SPECIAL CONSIDERATION (WAIVER) REMARKS  DIRECT ENTRY  UTME  
 
 
  (xi) NDU requires five (5)’O’level credit passes in English 
Language, History or Government and any other three 
(3) subjects, two (2)of which must be Arts subjects at 
not more than two (2) sittings..  
(xii) PHC requires five (5) 'O' level credit passes to include 
English Language and Government  
(xiii) UNIOSUN requires five (5) 'O' level credit passes to 
include English Language, Government or History or 
any other social sciences and Arts subjects.  
(xiv) UYO requires 'O' level credit passes in History or 
Government, English Language and any two (2) of the 
following:  Literature in English, Economics, 
Geography and French.  
  
  
  
Two (2) ‘A’ level 
passes in Arts, Social 
Sciences or Sciences 
subjects.  
  
Five (5) SSC credit passes to 
include English Language 
and any one (1) of Religious 
Studies, Economics and  
History.  
  
History/  
Government,  
Religious 
 Studies and 
any other two (2) 
subjects.  
  
DIRECT ENTRY  
(i)  TSUJ accepts NCE in relevant subjects or Bachelors 
Degree in any other programme.  
  
UTME  
 (i)  TSUJ – Literature inEnglish is not compulsory.
